Detailed Description

template<class SNode>
class GStack< SNode >

Stack implemented by singly-linked list. This class simply contains a link of nodes and does not keep the length information as it is not necessary for the FM algorithm (however, it may be useful for debugging). This saves memory and run-time to update the length information. Note that this class does not own the list node. They are supplied by the caller in order to better reuse the nodes.

Todo: Stack should be an adaptor of singly linked list.
